channel.title: Yellow belt on Kamaete: Karate at Home
channel.description: Recent content in Yellow belt on Kamaete: Karate at Home

item.title: Yellow belt / 9th Kyu
item.description: Basics Basic 1: Step and punch in zenkutsudachi Basic 2: Gyakuzuki from zenkutsudachi Basic 3: Front kick (Mae geri) Basic 4: Step up side kick (surikomi sokuto) Solo combinations Solo Combination 1: Elbow and back fist (Empi uraken) Solo Combination 2: Front kick/Opposite punch (Mae geri/Gyakuzuki) Solo Combination 3: Front kick/Jab punch (Mae geri/Tobikomizuki) Movements Movement 1: Shuffle 1-2/Tobikomizuki/Gyakuzuki Movement 2: Step 1-2 Kata Pinan nidan (1st 9 moves)
